document.full_text: mclaren's lewis hamilton, under fire from fans and rival drivers after losing his temper at the monaco grand prix, will learn from his mistakes just as ayrton senna did, williams driver rubens barrichello said.
document.title: hamilton will mellow with age, says barrichello
lines_and_colors: mclaren's lewis hamilton, under fire from fans and rival drivers after losing his temper at the monaco grand prix, will learn from his mistakes just as ayrton senna did, williams driver rubens barrichello said.
